::KitKat::
She jumped as Destructor put his hand on her shoulder. She was deep 
in thought and didn't even hear him enter the lab. She looked at 
him,"Ahh! Oh..sorry. I didn't hear you apporach." She looked at the 
monitor. "No, still getting readings and compositions organized.  but 
so far, it looks like  Megatron just made an exact replica of 
himself, minus the perfect skin color.  In the DNA sequence, it was 
mising a small genetic chomosome that would have given Megatron's 
clone the perfect color. But that's about it so far.  I still have a 
long way to wait for the rest of the results."  She sighed and looked 
at the screen. Then back up at Destructor,"Everything OK?" her voice 
showing her exhaustion.  She was tired, mentally and physically. But 
she wanted to get the testing done and over with as soon as possable.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:

security

horsemen 
> will sleep on the floor.." He sent the coordinates of each of the 
bots 
> quaters to them. "There now on to other things" he walked into the 
lab and 
> put his hand on Kit Kat's shoulder.."So any news on our little 
fallen friend 
> here?"
